mapper.select: select * from ( select a.*,rownum as num from ( select board.* from board order by b_date desc ) a order by num) b where b.num between #{param1} and #{param2} order by b.num
select b_seqno,title,content,writer,b_date,views from board where b_seqno=#{param1}
mapper.update: update board set views = views+1 where b_seqno=#{param1}
update board set title=#{param1},content=#{param2} where b_seqno=#{param3}
